title: ICT for Change (TechNest)
short: Grassroots digital literacy and school digital transformation for low-resource schools.
keyMetrics: Trained 180 students (65% girls), 92 teachers; deployed SMS in 8 schools; 4 community ICT hubs.

title: Women in Tech Series
short: Digital literacy and confidence-building workshops for young women and girls.

title: IDP Camp Tech Project
short: Technology and digital skills training for youth in IDP camps.

title: Startup Launchpad (Young Women's Launchpad)
short: Incubation and acceleration program focused on women entrepreneurs.
keyMetrics: 6-week cohort; 10 participants; 5 businesses selected for mentorship.

title: Bars to Hope (Prison Reform)
short: IT and vocational training for incarcerated individuals to support reintegration.

title: Pages & Planets Initiative
short: Green education for children integrating environmental literacy, art, and hands-on science.

title: Bring Back Our School Farm
short: Revives hands-on farming in schools with climate-smart agriculture training.

title: Urban & Community Farming Projects
short: Sustainable urban agriculture and seed saving for local food security.

title: Climate-Smart Agriculture Trainings
short: Field-based workshops for smallholder farmers and women in agribusiness on sustainable practices.

title: World Clean-up Day 2025 - Mararaba
short: Community clean-up and advocacy event along Abuja-Keffi corridor.
keyMetrics: 57 volunteers, 2 tonnes of waste removed, 6 Community Waste Watch Groups formed

title: Nigeria Plastic Action Campaign
short: Community initiative enabling women and youth to convert plastic waste into income (with UNDP).

title: Clean Energy Access (Solar & Renewable Deployment)
short: Provides off-grid solar solutions and renewable energy training to communities.

title: Waste to Wealth Program
short: Circular economy initiatives: women's packaging co-ops, waste-to-wealth youth enterprise, Baban-Bola empowerment.

title: Skills for Impact Training Program (2025)
short: EU-funded youth empowerment program in partnership with ImpactPal Africa.

title: Community Business School
short: Trains micro-entrepreneurs (70% women) in business and clean technology adoption.
